channel.title: [Delta] exp change [Delta]
channel.description:
guys, here's my problem:
my lvling in my server is wayyyy tooo slow
how do i change the exp a player gets from killing/attacking something?

item.title: [Delta] exp change [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

first Search "AttackingOn2.offTimer = System.currentTimeMillis(); till you see something like

double TotalExp = 0; if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) { TotalExp = (double)(1200*hitDiff); // Range TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4); } else if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(1200*hitDiff); // Range TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(500*hitDiff); // Attack, Strength and defence TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(500*hitDiff); // Hitpoints TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);

Edit the “(####*hitDiff);” part, the number inside there is the xp rate

Next, search “if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType != 0) {” and do the same thing.

Read full topic
